channel.title: CVE Feed for Mia Technology Inc. -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Mia Technology Inc. -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-5862|2024-06-24T13:45:34.351Z -- mia%20technology%20inc. -- mia-med%20health%20aplication
item.description: Improper Restriction of Excessive Authentication Attempts vulnerability in Mia Technology Inc. Mia-Med Health Aplication allows Interface Manipulation.This issue affects Mia-Med Health Aplication: before 1.0.14.

item.title: CVE-2023-6518|2024-02-08T11:46:17.475Z -- mia%20technology%20inc. -- mi%CC%87a-med
item.description: Plaintext Storage of a Password vulnerability in Mia Technology Inc. MİA-MED allows Read Sensitive Strings Within an Executable.This issue affects MİA-MED: before 1.0.7.

item.title: CVE-2023-6519|2024-02-08T11:50:58.838Z -- mia%20technology%20inc. -- mi%CC%87a-med
item.description: Exposure of Data Element to Wrong Session vulnerability in Mia Technology Inc. MİA-MED allows Read Sensitive Strings Within an Executable.This issue affects MİA-MED: before 1.0.7.

item.title: CVE-2023-6515|2024-02-08T09:43:20.064Z -- mia%20technology%20inc. -- mi%CC%87a-med
item.description: Authorization Bypass Through User-Controlled Key vulnerability in Mia Technology Inc. MİA-MED allows Authentication Abuse.This issue affects MİA-MED: before 1.0.7.

item.title: CVE-2023-6517|2024-02-08T11:41:09.482Z -- mia%20technology%20inc. -- mi%CC%87a-med
item.description: Exposure of Sensitive Information Due to Incompatible Policies vulnerability in Mia Technology Inc. MİA-MED allows Collect Data as Provided by Users.This issue affects MİA-MED: before 1.0.7.

item.title: CVE-2024-3264|2024-06-24T12:45:13.204Z -- mia%20technology%20inc. -- mia-med%20health%20aplication
item.description: Use of a Broken or Risky Cryptographic Algorithm vulnerability in Mia Technology Inc. Mia-Med Health Aplication allows Signature Spoofing by Improper Validation.This issue affects Mia-Med Health Aplication: before 1.0.14.

item.description: Improper Restriction of Excessive Authentication Attempts vulnerability in Mia Technology Inc. Mia-Med Health Aplication allows Interface Manipulation.This issue affects Mia-Med Health Aplication: before 1.0.14.
